pr_title: [CDAP-16869] Create a page for outputs configuration (plugin JSON creator)

timeline.message: [CDAP-16869] Create a page for outputs configuration (plugin JSON creator)
[CDAP-16869] Create a page for outputs configuration (plugin JSON creator)

timeline.bodyText: It is a little misleading that we call the page as "Outputs" but allow the user to specify only one plugin property. Can we change the title to Output and prepopulate a plugin property that the user has already configured? They can configure a plugin property to have schema editor
timeline.author: ajainarayanan

[CDAP-16869] Create a page for outputs configuration (plugin JSON creator)
